app.revision_history: Fix for missing global includes. Fix for black boxed IP
app.name: bpsvvs
app.summary: This is a Blue Pearl Software Visual Verification Suite (VVS) integration app that helps you load your Xilinx design into Blue Pearl's Visual Verification Suite RTL debugging environment.

proc.name: generate_bps_project
proc.summary: Generates the Blue Pearl Tcl project file

proc.name: launch_bps
proc.summary: Launches Blue Pearl Visual Verification Suite

proc.name: update_vivado_into_bps
proc.summary: Updates the current results into the Blue Pearl Visual Verification Suite
